channel.title: How to Add NPC's And make them work!
channel.description:
I want to add NPC's to my server to block off certain parts, and iv goten one added, but this one heres the code i put in autospawn.cfg [code] spawn = 33 3212 3439 0 0 0 0 0 1 DoorMang [/code] And i try to start the server, and i get this [code] Starting Realm Of Darkness on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 3 3212 3439 0 0 0 0 0 1 DoorMang"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1547) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27)
[/code] Somone told me theres an error on my NPChandler.java line 1547 as it says in there, so there it is [code] newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true); [/code] Theres other lines that the error say, but if need to put them please tell me. thanks

item.title: How to Add NPC's And make them work!
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

songoty jeeze, put a // infront of doormang

Read full topic

item.title: How to Add NPC's And make them work!
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

[quote=“Songoty, post:1, topic:163727”]I want to add NPC’s to my server to block off certain parts, and iv goten one added, but this one heres the code i put in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 33      3212    3439    0       0       0       0       0       1       DoorMang

And i try to start the server, and i get this

Starting Realm Of Darkness on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3
3      3212    3439    0       0       0       0       0       1       DoorMang"

        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1547)
        at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23)
        at server.main(server.java:27)

Somone told me theres an error on my NPChandler.java line 1547 as it says in there, so there it is

newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);

Theres other lines that the error say, but if need to put them please tell me.
thanks[/quote]

ROLF LMFAO EASIEST PROBLEM EVER!!!

dude… you didnt put a // before the DoorMang… so replace that line with this

spawn = 33      3212    3439    0       0       0       0       0       1       DoorMang

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add NPC's And make them work!

item.title: How to Add NPC's And make them work!
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

I want to add NPC’s to my server to block off certain parts, and iv goten one added, but this one heres the code i put in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 33      3212    3439    0       0       0       0       0       1       DoorMang

And i try to start the server, and i get this

Starting Realm Of Darkness on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3
3      3212    3439    0       0       0       0       0       1       DoorMang"

        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1547)
        at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23)
        at server.main(server.java:27)

Somone told me theres an error on my NPChandler.java line 1547 as it says in there, so there it is

newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);

Theres other lines that the error say, but if need to put them please tell me.
thanks
